articles.title: Europe Reels From Worst Floods In Years As Death Toll Nears 130 - CHANNELS TELEVISION
articles.description: Devastating floods have torn through entire villages and killed at least 128 people in Europe, most of them in western Germany where stunned emergency services were still combing the wreckage on Friday. Unsuspecting residents were caught completely off guard …
articles.content: A picture taken on July 15, 2021, shows cars piled up by the water at a roundabout in the Belgian city of Verviers, after heavy rains and floods lashed western Europe, killing at least two people in … [+5578 chars]

articles.author: Hannah Thomas-Peter
articles.title: Europe floods: Inside the unprepared city that 'has to change' after devastation leaves lives in ruin - Sky News
Europe Flooding Death Toll Rises As Water Recedes - NPR
articles.description: The rising death toll from disastrous flooding in Germany and Belgium came as rescue workers toiled to clear up the devastation revealed by receding water and prevent further damage.
articles.content:
A car washed up by the flood leans against a tree near the river Ahr in Bad Neuenahr-Ahrweiler, Germany, on Friday.
Philipp von Ditfurth/AP

articles.title: German, Belgian flood deaths rise to 157 as search continues - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: WASSENBURG: Rescue workers searched flood-ravaged parts of Germany and Belgium for survivors on Saturday after burst rivers and flash floods this week.
articles.content: German, Belgian flood deaths rise to 157 as search continues

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Germany picks through rubble after deadly European floods - CNA
articles.description: Troops and firefighters were called in Saturday to help villagers launch a mammoth clean up after the worst floods to hit western Europe in decades left nearly 130 people dead and dozens more missing.
articles.content: SCHULD, Germany: Rescue workers scrambled Saturday (Jul 17) to find survivors and victims of the devastation wreaked by the worst floods to hit western Europe in living memory, which have already lef… [+4339 chars]

articles.description: Officials fear even more bodies will be found in cars and trucks that were swept away, as the clean-up begins.
articles.content:
The death toll from disastrous flooding in western Europe rose above 150 on Saturday (local time) as rescue workers toiled to clear up the devastation and prevent further damage.

articles.author: Oliver Trapnell
articles.title: ‘End of the EU!’ Donald Tusk warns internal conflicts will destroy the bloc amid standoff - Daily Express
articles.description: DONALD TUSK has warned the European Union could be destroyed from within amid an internal standoff with Poland and Hungary.
